::Bodicons::

     The Bodicons were finished being repaired.  First Decapi=
tron stepped out of his CR, then Headshot, then Gutclaw, then Legtrap, then=
 Explobody.  

      "Alright boys, let's go see if we can have our playtim=
e," Decapitron said, then walked out of the room and down a corridor. 

   =
     The rest of the Bodicons loyally followed...



~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~
~~~~~~~LurkerAbyss~~~~~~~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~The Keeper Of Souls~
~=
The Shadow Of The Dark~
~I Am The Lurker Of The Abyss~
